wikipedia_page.main: Linda Sutton (born 1947) is a British painter. She was born in Southend-on-Sea, Essex. She studied at Winchester School of Art and the Royal College of Art in London, graduating in 1974.She is a regular exhibitor at the Royal Academy Summer Exhibition.

response: * Linda Sutton, artist and regular exhibitor at the Royal Academy of Arts Summer Exhibition
